accordion.title: Your Needs
accordion.subtitle: Managing a fleet of vehicles can be a complex challenge. Connected fleet management is much more than simply monitoring assets,</br> it is a daily activity that encompasses financial, technical, human, and regulatory issues…

geo.title: Geolocation
geo.subtitle: Need to track your vehicles?
geo.description: Geolocate your vehicles when necessary. Identify completed routes, optimize itineraries and each vehicle’s rounds to improve efficiency. With GPS data, you know the position of your vehicles remotely and in real time—never lose track of them again!

tra.title: Traceability
tra.subtitle: Track your vehicles and their cargo
tra.description: SirGPS provides 360° monitoring, notably with IoT pairing of your fleet management solution, to guarantee the traceability of transported goods and merchandise. You can also track the location of various pieces of equipment.

con.title: Eco-driving
con.subtitle: Save money with eco-driving!
con.description: Analyze driver behavior with reliable, precise, and high-value indicators thanks to our integrated eco-driving module. Encourage drivers to practice eco-driving to reduce fuel costs and improve your fleet’s environmental impact.

carb.title: Fuel
carb.description: Fuel consumption is a major expense for businesses. Optimize your consumption with in-depth monitoring and detection of fraudulent activities such as fuel siphoning.

entre.title: Maintenance
entre.description: Your vehicle maintenance logbook becomes digital. Create your own maintenance plans and track all curative and preventive interventions carried out on your fleet.

rep.title: Reporting
rep.description: Generate detailed reports on vehicle usage, driving hours, and get notified of excessive use outside working hours.

fleet.title: Fleet Management Software
fleet.description: Designed for and with fleet managers, SirGPS is continuously evolving!

complete.title: Complete Solution
complete.description: Our solution covers all the needs of detailed fleet management

reports.title: Advanced Reports
reports.description: Various reports are generated in graphical, CSV, and PDF formats.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Tracking
maintenance.description: Vehicle maintenance is now automated thanks to maintenance scheduling systems and remote reporting of engine faults (DTC).

vehicles.title: CONNECT YOUR VEHICLES
vehicles.description: Our complete offer adapts to all types of vehicles, all fleet sizes, and all industries, thanks to vehicles connected either in first or second installation.

type1.title: Trip Tracking
type1.item1: Display of trips in timeline format
type1.item2: Odometer, usage time, distance traveled, etc.
type1.item3: Daily report of vehicle activity start and end

type2.title: Advanced Geolocation
type2.item1: Display of GPS positions by service
type2.item3: Proximity detection of vehicles to a given reference
type2.item4: Assisted geolocation for your points of interest
type2.item5: Position with a very small margin of error (less than 5 meters)

type3.title: Vehicle Status
type3.item3: Fuel level in liters and percentage
type3.item4: Engine fault codes (DTC) from onboard computer

solution.subtitle: Our Solutions
solution.title: SirGPS Platform
solution.description: Track your vehicles with GPS technology. Manage your fleet efficiently.
